alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Hopkins (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 10:09PM EDT until August 05 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Christian County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Caldwell County in western Kentucky... Southern Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 909 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dawson Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson Springs, Nortonville, Crofton, White Plains, St. Charles and Hawkins. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 86 and 101. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 15 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
